landing.whyTitle: Built for people who need it to actually work
landing.whyOffline: No WiFi or data plan required—works on the subway, in rural areas, anywhere
landing.whyInference: Everything runs on your phone. No video sent anywhere. Ever.
landing.whyPrivacy: Your camera feed never leaves your device unless you explicitly choose cloud features
landing.whyBilingual: Switch between English and French instantly
landing.whyUI: Buttons you can actually press. Text you can actually read.
landing.installIOS: iPhone: Share → Add to Home Screen
landing.faq1q: Does this use my data plan?
landing.faq1a: No. Everything runs on your phone. No internet needed for the core features.
landing.faq2q: Where does my camera video go?
landing.faq2a: Nowhere. It stays on your phone. We don't see it, we don't store it, we don't send it anywhere.
landing.faq3q: Will this work on my phone?
landing.faq3a: If your phone is from 2020 or newer and has a camera, probably yes. iPhone or Android both work.
landing.faq4q: What if I need help urgently?
landing.faq4a: Hold the red SOS button. It sends a text message to whoever you set up as your emergency contact. Works even without internet.
landing.faq5q: I only speak French. Will this work?
landing.faq5a: Yes. Tap the language button to switch to French. All voice guidance works in both languages.
landing.faq6q: Something isn't working. How do I get help?
landing.testimonial1: I use this every morning to walk to the corner store. It tells me about curbs before I trip.
landing.testimonial2: My phone doesn't have a data plan. This still works. That's all I needed to know.
landing.testimonial3: The buttons are huge. I can find them without looking. Exactly what I needed.
